data.title: Tarun Tahiliani Talks Bling, Brides
data.meta_description: The curtain's gone up on the third edition of designer Tarun Tahiliani's extravagant bridal couture exhibition. The event, which kicked off in Delhi over the weekend, is a lavish display of bejewelled lehengas and eye-popping jewels
data.text:
If you’re a die-hard Ranveer Singh fan, take this fun quiz to guess his hit ads by looking at their stills. Will you score 8/8 on this quiz?

The video of 54-year-old Neeru Saini’s recreation of viral ‘Gajagamini’ walk from ‘Heeramandi’ has gained a reaction from Netflix itself. Social media users have been showering love on the video that recreated Aditi Rao Hydari’s walk from the series.

Recently, actress Sanjeeda Shaikh opened up about working during her periods and reflected on the importance of being comfortable talking about periods. Read out to find more!

Here’s our exclusive interview with ‘Heeramandi’s Aditi Rao Hydari. Read here.

Take our Bollywood quiz on identifying these popular Hindi films based on courtesans like ‘Gangubai Kathiawadi’, ‘Devdas’, etc.

Besides ‘Heeramandi’s’ backdrop, costumes, cast and more, there’s something more to it--the intimate scenes and a few of the actors opened up about these intimate scenes recently. Here's what they had to say!

After her successful portrayal as 'Mallikajaan' in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Heeramandi', Manisha Koirala gets candid about her battle with cancer, divorce with Samrat Dahal and being open to finding new love again. Here's everything Manisha has to say.

Starring Manisha Koirala, Richa Chadha, Sonakshi Sinha, Sharmin Segal and Sanjeeda Shaikh in lead roles, here’s our honest review of ‘Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar’.

Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s upcoming series, Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar, is all set to release on Netflix. This 8-episode series revolves around tawaifs, love, betrayal, and independence, among others, back in the 1940s. Before the release of this series, here are some of his films we love for their grand sets and impressive storytelling.

In this special episode of 'SpeakEasy', we are thrilled to welcome Pratibha Ranta, the rising star set to captivate audiences in Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s highly anticipated Netflix period drama series, 'Heeramandi'. Join us as Pratibha Ranta shares her remarkable journey, from her humble beginnings in Shimla to the exhilarating moment of landing her dream role in 'Heeramandi'.

Sanjay Leela Bhansali's OTT debut web series Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar is about to be released. The premiere of the show took place in Mumbai and was attended by several Bollywood celebs. From Alia Bhatt and Salman Khan to Ananya Panday and Rashmika Mandana, take a look at who wore what at the event.

As we celebrate the special occasion of Ram Navami in India today, let's take a fun quiz to complete the lyrics of the hit Bollywood songs with the word 'Ram' in it.

If you are a huge fan of Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s direction, here’s a fun quiz for you to guess the hit Bollywood movies to the correct movie stills.

The official Instagram handle of The Academy Awards shared a clip of Deepika Padukone’s ‘Deewani Mastani’ song from ‘Bajirao Mastani’. Ranveer Singh’s comment has won our hearts.

Recently, Bollywood actress Aditi Rao Hydari took to Instagram to share an adorable engagement picture with Siddharth and we all are hearts. Check it out here!!

Sanjay Leela Bhansali is an Indian filmmaker and music composer best recognized for his work in Hindi cinema. He has won various awards, including seven National Film prizes and 12 Filmfare Awards, as well as a nomination for a BAFTA Award. So today, as he celebrates his 61st birthday, take our Bollywood quiz on guessing Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s most popular movie songs, like ‘Dola Re Dola’, ‘Pinga’, etc. from their stills.

This cinematic revival on Netflix highlights the worldwide popularity of Hindi films and represents a significant change in how audiences worldwide embrace and value Indian cinema. So, let’s take a look at five such Hindi films that broke viewership records on Netflix.

Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s ‘Heeramandi’ first look is out now and it features Manisha Koirala, Sonakshi Sinha, Aditi Rao Hydari, Sharmin Segal, Richa Chadha, and Sanjeeda Sheikh

From chic staycations to fun activities and pampering sessions, these handpicked experiences promise a unique way to welcome the new year in style.

Join us in celebrating Richa Chadha's birthday with a fun quiz! Test your Bollywood knowledge by matching movie stills to her blockbuster hits like 'Fukrey,' 'Fukrey Returns,' 'Gangs of Wasseypur,' and 'Masaan.' Are you ready for the challenge?

As Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s 2013 film 'Goliyon Ki Rasleela Ram-Leela' marks its 10th anniversary today, take our toughest quiz on this Bollywood hit starring Deepika and Ranveer. Answer the most challenging questions while singing 'Laal Ishq…'

The Leela Bhartiya City Bengaluru celebrated its second year anniversary recently and it was indeed a splendid event. The luxurious and serene property is a blend of serene spaces and modern aesthetics, and here’s what makes it standout.

The first episode of 'Koffee With Karan' Season 8 featured Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone as special guests. During the show, the couple shared several details of their relationship, including their romantic proposal and their wedding video, which has been shared with the public for the first time.

Bollywood actress Parineeti Chopra and AAP leader Raghav Chaddha recently got married in an intimate ceremony in Udaipur, Rajasthan. The actress and singer Parineeti recorded a special song for her husband, which was played at their wedding. Check it out!

The new bride Parineeti Chopra has finally shared the photos from her wedding to Raghav Chadha and they’re nothing short of a dream. The white wedding has Parineeti wearing a gorgeous Manish Malhotra lehenga with scene-stealing jewellery. Here are all the details of her wedding look.

Bollywood Actress Parineeti Chopra and AAP member Raghav Chadha are all set to marry today, i.e. 24th September 2023, at The Leela Palace in Rajasthan’s Udaipur. Here’s everything you need to know about their mehendi and sangeet ceremonies that happened yesterday.

Raghav Chadha and Parineeti Chopra’s wedding card has made it to the internet with all the details about the venue, themes and ceremonies. Let us summarise it all for you and keep you updated on all-thing #Raghneeti

As Sanjay Leela Bhnsali’s ‘Devdas' clocks in 21 years today, take our toughest quiz on this SRK-Aish starrer Bollywood hit film by answering all pressing questions in one go.

The International Indian Film Academy Awards or IIFA, as it is rather popularly known, was held in Abu Dhabi this year, and a lot of Bollywood stars flocked to UAE’s Yas Island for the ceremony. Just like each year, a number of wins came without any surprise while there were others which we honestly didn’t see coming. Read on to find out.

Be it Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Madhuri Dixit Nene’s looks in ‘Devdas’ or Alia Bhatt’s saree look in ‘2 States’, there is absolutely no dearth of (wedding) sarees to take inspiration from! So, here are all the onscreen saree looks from Bollywood movies we loved, perfect for a bridal look.

Veteran actor Ratna Pathak Shah called out Bollywood’s obsession with the appearance of actresses, and questioned the shallow nature of the movie business.

Destination weddings are becoming popular because couples these days want it to be an intimate experience with memories of a lifetime. But planning a wedding far away from one’s hometown can be a challenge, so here’s a guide on how to do it along with some national and international venue options.

No Holi party is complete without some Bollywood music. Our list combines all of the new and old tracks that are ideal for a Holi party like ‘Balam Pichkari’, ‘Rang Barse’ and more.

Be it ‘Padmaavat’ or ‘Bajirao Mastani’, director SLB’s period dramas are in a league of their own. Even the first look of his upcoming drama, ‘Heeramandi’, created a stir on social media. On Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s birthday, try our quiz on his best films.

Talented Bollywood couple Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor both won Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival awards last night, proving what a power couple they are.

Netflix recently shared the first look of Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s upcoming web series, ‘Heeramandi’, featuring Manisha Koirala, Aditi Rao Hydari, Sharmin Segal, Richa Chadha, Sanjeeda Shaikh, and Sonakshi Sinha. Here’s what we think about it.

The Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, and Priyanka Chopra film ‘Bajirao Mastani’, directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali, has been thought of as a beautiful poetic love story. But in truth, it’s a problematic tale of stalking, infatuation, and adultery. Here’s why its plot needs to stop being glorified despite the rest of the film being good.

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan’s on screen Looks In ‘Taal’, the Subhash Ghai and A.R Rahman musical which took 90s box office by storm, were so ahead of their time that they are valid fashion choices even now.

Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh’s music video for the song ‘Current Laga Re’ from Rohit Shetty’s film ‘Cirkus’ is finally out. Fun and energetic, the dance number is sure to rule playlists during the party season, thanks to Ranveer-Deepika’s sizzling chemistry!

Here’s a fun movie quiz for all Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone fans out there! Prove your love for the most adorable real and reel life couple by guessing their movies from their stills in our Bollywood trivia quiz. Can you identify them all correctly? Let’s check out!

Director Sanjay Leela Bhansali has had a stellar year thanks to his film ‘Gangubai Kathiawadi’ winning accolades. Now, the director has announced his first non-film music album, ‘Sukoon’, which will be released this year. Here’s what we know.

Hindi movies are full of examples of toxic and problematic parents, from ‘Namaste London’ to ‘Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham’, ‘Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam’, ‘Ram Leela’ and ‘Dil Dhadakne Do.’ Here are the most controlling and abusive ones of the lot, who are definitely not shining examples of parenting.

Bollywood’s power couple Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone got married four years ago and celebrated their wedding anniversary on Monday. As DP was busy at work, Ranveer decided to show up at her office with the best gift a girl can expect. Read on to know more.

As Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone’s first movie together—’Ram-Leela—completes nine years in the industry, take our toughest quiz on the movie and prove that you not only love the film but the actors as well!

From Mastani and Leela, to Nandini and Gangu, here is the Sanjay Leela Bhansali movie character you are like based on your zodiac sign. So, here’s the onscreen character from ‘Padmaavat’, ‘Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam’, ‘Bajirao Mastani’, ‘Gangubai Kathiawadi’, or ‘Ram Leela’, that your sun sign most resembles, based on astrology.

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's character Paro from Devdas is a strong female character who is a great example of a woman leaving a toxic relationship. Proof of how her rage is perfectly justified, Paro chooses honour over love.
